title.zh: 潮汕牛肉火锅 | Chaoshan Beef Hotpot
title.en: Chaoshan Beef Hotpot | 潮汕牛肉火锅

description.zh: 鲜嫩多汁的牛肉，浓郁的牛骨汤，深圳必尝美食
description.en: Tender beef, rich bone broth, a must-try in Shenzhen

zh: 讲究“鲜”字，现宰现吃，部位分类细致，口感各异。
en: Focuses on freshness, meticulous cuts of beef with distinct textures.

description.zh: 清甜椰子水煮文昌鸡，深圳特色美食
description.en: Wenchang chicken cooked in sweet coconut water, a Shenzhen specialty

zh: 海南椰子水与文昌鸡的完美结合，汤清爽口，鸡肉滑嫩。
en: Perfect combination of Hainan coconut water and Wenchang chicken, refreshing soup and tender meat.

title.zh: 广式早茶 | Cantonese Dim Sum
title.en: Cantonese Dim Sum | 广式早茶

description.zh: 一盅两件，享受悠闲的早晨时光
description.en: Enjoy a leisurely morning with tea and dim sum

zh: 虾饺、烧卖、凤爪、排骨……种类繁多，精致美味。
en: Shrimp dumplings, siu mai, chicken feet, spare ribs... huge variety and exquisite taste.

description.zh: 靠海吃海，新鲜生猛的海鲜盛宴
description.en: Fresh and lively seafood feast by the sea

zh: 盐田海鲜街、南澳海鲜市场，现点现做，鲜味十足。
en: Yantian Seafood Street, Nan'ao Seafood Market, cooked to order, full of freshness.

description.zh: 东门老街、华强北，汇聚各地特色小吃
description.en: Dongmen Old Street, Huaqiangbei, gathering snacks from all over

zh: 烤生蚝、酸辣粉、臭豆腐、鸡蛋仔……应有尽有。
en: Grilled oysters, hot and sour noodles, stinky tofu, egg waffles... everything you can imagine.

title.zh: 隆江猪脚饭 | Pork Leg Rice
title.en: Pork Leg Rice | 隆江猪脚饭

description.zh: 深圳打工人的灵魂美食，肥而不腻
description.en: Soul food for Shenzhen workers, fatty but not greasy

zh: 软糯入味的猪脚，搭配酸菜和卤汁，是深圳最常见的快餐之一。
en: Soft and flavorful pork leg, served with pickled vegetables and gravy, one of the most common fast foods in Shenzhen.

description.zh: 皮脆肉嫩，骨香多汁，深圳经典名菜
description.en: Crispy skin, tender meat, juicy and fragrant, a classic Shenzhen dish

zh: 以润、滑、甜、嫩为特点，是深圳的一张美食名片。
en: Characterized by moist, smooth, sweet, and tender texture, a culinary card of Shenzhen.

title.zh: 公明烧鹅 | Gongming Roast Goose
title.en: Gongming Roast Goose | 公明烧鹅

description.zh: 皮脆肉滑，香味浓郁，深圳传统名菜
description.en: Crispy skin, tender meat, rich aroma, traditional Shenzhen dish

zh: 选用本地草鹅，用传统方法腌制，木炭烤制，皮脆肉嫩，肥而不腻。
en: Using local grass geese, marinated with traditional methods, roasted with charcoal, crispy skin and tender meat, fatty but not greasy.

title.zh: 深圳肠粉 | Shenzhen Cheung Fun
title.en: Shenzhen Cheung Fun | 深圳肠粉

description.zh: 薄如蝉翼，晶莹剔透，深圳早餐必备
description.en: Thin as cicada wings, crystal clear, essential Shenzhen breakfast

zh: 米浆蒸制而成，可搭配虾仁、牛肉、鸡蛋等多种馅料，淋上特制酱汁，美味可口。
en: Made from rice slurry, can be filled with shrimp, beef, eggs and other fillings, drizzled with special sauce, delicious and tasty.
